decision_conditions: The premises shall not be used for the purposes hereby permitted other than between the hours of 10:00AM and 19:00 on Mondays to Saturday, 10:00AM and 17:00 Sundays and not at all on Bank or Public holidays without the prior consent in writing of the Local Planning Authority.

To enable the Local Planning Authority to retain control in the interests of amenity, and in order that the development accords with Development Control Policies Development Plan Document Policy DC61.
The development hereby permitted shall not be carried out otherwise than in complete accordance with the approved plans (as set out on page one of this decision notice).
For the avoidance of doubt and to ensure that the development is carried out as approved.

Within six months of the date of this decision notice details of refuse and recycling facilities to serve the proposed use hereby permitted shall be submitted to and approved in writing by the Local Planning Authority. The refuse and recycling facilities shall be permanently retained thereafter.

Insufficient information has been supplied with the application to judge how refuse and recycling will be managed on site.  Submission of this detail prior to occupation in the case of new building works or prior to the use commencing in the case of changes of use will protect the amenity of occupiers of the development and also the locality generally and ensure that the development accords with the Development Control Policies Development Plan Document Policy DC61.
A active window display shall be provided at maintained all times in the shop window fronting Roneo Link
In the interests of visual amenity, and in order that the development accords with Development Control Policies Development Plan Document Policy DC61.

Statement Required by Article 35(2) of the Town and Country Planning (Development Management) Order 2015: No significant problems were identified during the consideration of the application, and therefore it has been determined in accordance with paragraph 38 of the National Planning Policy Framework 2018.
description: Retrospective application for change of use from A1 (Barber shop) to Beauty Salon (Sui Generis)
